com.palomamobile.android.sdk.notification

Interface INotificationService


  • public interface INotificationService
    This interface is consumed by the Retrofit library to provide access to the Paloma Mobile Platform Notification Service RESTful API. All calls are synchronous. To get a concrete implementation of this interface call IServiceManager.getService() This class provides somewhat low level access to the Server API it may be more convenient to use methods in INotificationManager.
    See Also:
    Paloma Mobile Platform Notification Service RESTful API

      • addGcmRegistrationId

        GcmRegistrationIdResponse addGcmRegistrationId(String requestId,
                                             Long userId,
                                             String deviceId,
                                             JsonObject gcmRegistrationId)
        Updates users GcmRegistrationId. The default provided implementation of the INotificationManager makes this call whenever required to ensure the GcmRegistrationId is up to date.
        Parameters:
        requestId - for the purposes of identifying retries
        userId -
        deviceId -

        JobPostEchoNotification provides a convenient wrapper, consider using it instead.
